page.title: 08MORTON HILL FARM
page.content: MORTON HILL FARM, THIS FARM IS RENTED FROM LADY MASON. IT CONTAINS 450 ACRES AT A LEASE OF Â£37 PER ACRE.THE FARM IS MAINLY ARABLE BUT DOES HAVE SOME SHEEP. BECAUSE OF COSTS MANY FARM ANIMALS HAVE DECLINED ON FARMS IN THIS AREA. THE MAIN CROPS ARE POTATOES, SUGAR BEET AND BARLEY WHICH IS DRITRIBUTED AROUND THE NOTTINGHAMSHIRE AREA. THERE ARE MANY WILD ANIMALS ON THE ESTATE. THE FARM EMPLOYES 2 FULLTIME MEN AND 1 FULLTIME WOMEN. THE FARM IS NOTED FOR HAVING A PERMANENT TRAMP WHO LIVES IN A TIN SHED.LIKE ALL THE FARMS IN THE QREA IT IS FULLY AUTOMATED HAVING 6 TRACTORS. AGAIN THE LAND IS IRRIGATED WHICH IN A DRY SEASON CAN IMPROVE THE YIELD FOUR FOLD.AN IRRIGATION SYSTEM CAN PAY FOR ITSELF IN ONE YEAR.
